chapter.para: Middle chapters talk about the stuff the book's really supposed to be about. This one is all about "Cool-Tech", which is both Cool and Technical. And since this is a Nutshell book, it is a comprehesive reference to all of the coolness.

appendix.title: Fiddly Bits We Didn't Want to Address Elsewhere
appendix.para: Even though this is a technical reference, there were a few little details that were to complicated or inconsequential to include in one of the real chapters. So they're here, in a chapter that clearly indicates that it doesn't have to be read.
